snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [067] Bram Stoker's Dracula
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by:- /Y\ad/Y\atty

Another game for the Longplay archive.  Not my best playthough and I look abit of a noob playing it ;)

This represents one of the worst games on not just the SegaCD platform, but all platforms.  I cant imagine why Psygnosis would want their name on it.

The FMV Clips are particuarly low res (as most of the early segacd games) but the ingame fmv backdrop doesnt look so bad.  The Gameplay is awful, just walk right and kill whats in your way.  The collision detection is awful and so are the controls. or maybe I just suck!

I didnt enjoy playing through this, but as I said at the start, Its one for the archives now. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
